Class EspAllOfBuilder<ElementT extends EspView>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.nenick.espressomacchiato.matchers.EspAllOfBuilder<ElementT>
  • Type Parameters:
    ElementT - View element type which will be used to perform actions and assertions on match.

extends java.lang.Object
